name: Pyramid Treasure Mystery
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Pyramid Treasure Mystery

Description:   In this game, find objects and clues that might help you to solve the ancient puzzles to find a way out of this pyramid. Good luck and have fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/pyramid-treasure-mystery/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
